entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Fort Erie

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then periods of rain changing to 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
